loans.name: Ajaboglan

texts.en: Ajaboglan is 60 years old, married, and has four children.  As the main source of income for his family, he has been raising livestock for the past 20 years. Thanks to his hard work, Ajaboglan has grown his agriculture venture from one cow; now he sells milk and animals, and in order to continue developing his business, Ajaboglan has applied for a loan of 1200 AZN to purchase additional livestock, which he will raise and sell. He plans to invest his profits from this loan into further expansion of his business.

loans.use: To purchase livestock to raise and sell.

loans.name: Thaier

texts.en:
Thaier is 36 years old and comes from Ramallah. He is married and has four children, two boys and two girls, of whom two are at school.

Thaier owns a small cafeteria where he makes FALAFEL (traditional food sandwiches) and sells some chips, choclates and drinks.

He asked Ryada for funds to buy goods and two refrigerators, one for drinks and the other for display.

He hopes he will be able to improve his income and provide a better life for his wife and children and provide them with the highest degrees of education.

loans.use: to buy goods and two refrigerators

loans.name: Saeeda

texts.en:
Saeeda is 49 years old, a married lady who lives with her husband and three children, a boy and two girls;  two of them are in school. The person appearing in the picture is Saeeda's husband since it is not approved to have a picture of her due to cultural manners in the area.
 
Saeeda has a small farm within her courtyard for raising livestock and birds in order to sell them. She helps her husband with the income in order to provide a better life for her family and provide her children with the best education they can get.

She asked Ryada for funds to buy new iron housing for the animals and water and food containers and to develop her small farm and enlarge it.

loans.use: to buy new iron housing for the animals and water and food containers and to develop her small farm

loans.name: Carlos Alberto

texts.es: Carlos de 34 años se dedica a la venta de soya desde hace 2 años atrás. Vive en el norte de Guayaquil en el sector conocido como las Orquídeas, su esposa Amada también se dedica al mismo negocio y juntos tienen 3 hijos menores de edad que asisten a la escuela. En el año 2010 decidió emprender de forma independiente el trabajo de taxi amigo pero como no es legal empezó la venta de soya junto a su esposa. El trabajo no demanda mucho tiempo en la preparación por la tanto una vez hecho el producto lo ofertan en parte frontal de su domicilio, también hace entregas a cliente fijos bajo pedido. Como tiene su taxi no se le complica mucho el traslado y brinda un mejor servicio. Con el crédito Carlos comprar soya para la preparación, botellas plásticas. Su meta a largo plazo es comprar un vehículo propio ya que el actual es alquilado, también poder empezar su casa propia y continuar con el negocio.
texts.en:
Carlos is 34 years old and has worked selling soy milk for the past two years. He lives in the north of Guayaquil in the area known as Las Orquídeas [The Orchids]. His wife, Amada, also works in the same business, and together they have three children who attend school.

In the year 2010, he decided to start working independently driving an unregistered taxi, but because that is not legal, he began selling soy milk with his wife. The work doesn't require much preparation time, so once the product is made, they sell it in the front part of their residence. They also deliver orders to regular clients. Because he has his taxi, the transportation is no problem and he can provide a better service.

With this loan, Carlos will buy plastic bottles and soy to prepare soy milk. His long-term goal is to buy his own vehicle, as his current one is leased. He also wants to be able to begin building his own house and continue with the business.

loans.use: to purchase soy and bottles.

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Maria Marta

texts.es:
María, se dedica a la venta de mariscos, este negocio es muy variable lo realizara de hace 10 años, también vende verduras como una alternativa cuando la venta de mariscos está baja, ella vive con su hijo, la vivienda es propia, su esposo no vive con ella pero si le ayuda económicamente.
Está solicitando un préstamo para invertirlo en el negocio, comprándose variedad de mariscos como pescado de diferentes especies, camarones, conchas, esto dará la oportunidad de mejorar el inventario y la variedad del producto en el negocio.
La aspiración de ella es a futuro tener un vehículo para el negocio, que le permite transportarse desde donde realiza la compra hacia su vivienda y para distribuir a los clientes, también quiere aumentar su nivel de ventas.
texts.en:
María sells seafood.  It’s a very variable business that’s she’s been in for the last ten years.  She also sells vegetables as an alternative when seafood sales drop.  She lives with her son and her house is hers.  Her husband does not live with her but does help economically.

She’s asking for a loan to invest in the business.  She will buy a variety of seafood like different species of fish, shrimp and clams.  This will give her the opportunity of improving her inventory and the variety of products in the business.

Her hope is to have a vehicle for the business in the future that will allow her to get from where she buys back home to sell to her customers; she also wants to increase her sales levels.

loans.use: to buy seafood.

loans.name: Oscar Eulises

texts.es:
Oscar, atiende un taller de estructuras metálicas, este negocio lo heredó hace dos años de su padre, él es soltero no tiene hijos y vive en una casa familiar.
Esta solicitando préstamos para la compra de lamina, hierro, pintura, lijas, que son necesarios en el día a día para realizar su trabajo, el préstamo le ayudara dándole los recursos económicos para poder mejorar su producción en el taller y prestar un mejor servicio a los clientes.

El objetivo de él es a través del préstamo pueda disponer de los materiales para atender una mayor demanda de los clientes y ofrecer un trabajo de calidad.
texts.en:
Oscar has a metal shop he inherited from his father two years ago.  He’s single and has no children.  He lives in the family home.

He’s asking for loans to buy sheet metal, iron, paint and sandpaper needed day to day for his work.  The loan will help him by giving him the economic resources to improve the shop and provide better customer service.

His goal through the loan is to have supplies on hand to meet more customer demand and to offer quality work.

loans.use: to buy sheet metal, iron, paint and sandpaper.

loans.name: Amal

texts.en:
Amal is a 37-year-old lady from Khan Younes, Gaza. She lives with her family of 8 children, from which five are at schools. The person appearing in the picture is Amal's husband since due to cultural manners she couldn't appear in a photo.

Amal has been working in their grocery store for four years in order to help her husband make ends meet for their family. She asked Ryada for fund in order to buy refrigerators and to improve the decoration and have more space in the store.

Amal hopes to improve productivity and have more customers to increase her family's income and help her husband to provide a better life for their children.

loans.use: to buy refrigerators and to improve the decoration of the shop

loans.name: Zulma Magdalena

texts.es:
Zulma, administra una pupuseria, trabaja todos los días de la semana realizando la venta de estos productos y de tamales, ella tiene un hijo de 16 años, vive con su esposo, está realizando estos negocios como una alternativa para poder obtener mejores ingresos a su familia.

Solicita un préstamo para la compra de mercadería para la apertura de un nuevo negocio, comprándose el aceite, los condimentos, gaseosas, materiales para el empaque, que son necesarios para iniciar una nueva venta, este crédito le ayudará a mejorar las utilidades aperturando este nuevo punto donde sus ganancias serán mejor.
El objetivo de ella es tener la oportunidad de mejorar cada día y crecer en su negocio, espera a través de los préstamos ir logrando el desarrollo en el comercio.
texts.en:
Zulma runs a pupusa shop [stuffed, grilled corncakes].  She works every day of the week selling these product and also tamales.  She has a 16-year-old son.  She lives with her husband.  She’s carrying out these businesses as an alternative way of earning better family income.

She’s asking for a loan to buy merchandise to open a new business.  She will buy oil, condiments, soft-drinks and packaging materials needed to start new sales.  The loan will help her improve profits by opening a new spot where profits will be better.  Her goal is to improve every day and to make her business grow.  She hopes through the loans to develop in commerce.

loans.use: to buy oil, condiments, soft-drinks and packaging materials.

loans.name: Juan Pablo

texts.es:
Juan, tiene 25 años de edad, vive con su esposa, ellos no tienen vivienda propia sino que alquila, se dedica al cultivo de maíz desde hace cinco años, lo aprendió con su padre, hasta el momento  las cosechas le ha ayudadoa cubrir las necesidades del hogar.

Él solicita un préstamo para la compra de tres sacos de sulfato y dos de fórmula, estos materiales serán aplicados al cultivo durante el proceso para qué se prevenga de las plagas y al mismo tiempo se fortalezca la producción, su objetivo es aumentar la cosecha y espera a través de esta inversión poderla realizar, a través del crédito con KIVA su trabajo en agricultura se realizará de una mejor manera
texts.en:
Juan is 25 years old and lives with his wife.  They do not have their own home, so they rent.  He is a farmer who has been cultivating corn for more than 5 years.  He learned to farm from his father.  Up until now, his harvests have helped him to cover the basic needs for his household.

He is requesting a loan to buy 3 sacks of sulfate and 2 sacks of fertilizer.  These materials will be applied to the crops he is growing in order to prevent pests and also strengthen his production.  His goal is to increase his harvest, and he hopes that through this investment financed by Kiva he will be able to carry out his work in agriculture in a better way.

loans.use: to buy 3 sacks of sulfate and 2 sacks of fertilizer

loans.name: Jose Alfredo

texts.es:
Jose, tiene 31 años de edad, vive con su esposa y dos hijos, la casa en la que viven es propia y se dedica a cultivar chile verde, tiene siete años de estar en esta actividad, aprendió este trabajo con su padre y actualmente no realiza para el sostenimiento de su propio hogar.
Solicita un préstamo porque está iniciando la siembra de una nueva parcela de chiles, para esto comprará foliares y abono que son necesarios para aplicarlos y prevenir las plagas y fortalecer la producción de Chile.

Su aspiración de mejorar cada vez más su economía familiar a través del uso de estos préstamos.
texts.en:
José, 31, lives with his wife and two children in a house of his own.  He grows green chilies and has been in this occupation for seven years having learned it from his father.  At present, he does it to support his own home.

He’s asking for a loan because he’s about to start planting chilies in a new parcel of land and needs manure and leaf fertilizer to apply in order to prevent infestations and to strengthen the chili production.  His goal is to improve his family’s income more each time through the use of these loans.

loans.use: to buy manure.

loans.name: Ana Estela

texts.es:
Ana, se dedica a la venta de ropa, vive con su esposo y sus cinco hijos los cuales actualmente están estudiando, ella y su esposo son los que trabajan y proveen a sus hijos lo necesario, Ana tiene cinco años de estar dedicada a la venta de ropa en la ciudad, esto lo aprendió en la familia ya que son comerciantes, trabaja durante las mañanas de lunes a sábado.

Esta solicitando un préstamo para poder realizar la compra de variedad de ropa para niños, damas y caballeros en blusas y faldas, ropa interior, pantalones y trajecitos, este crédito ayudará con el recurso económico que le permita incrementar el inventario y obtener mayores utilidades.

El objetivo de ella es encontrar las alternativas para fortalecer el negocio, ya que esto le permitirá mejorar también su capacidad económica para hacerle frente a las obligaciones del hogar.
texts.en:
Ana sells clothes.  She lives with her husband and five children who attend school at present.  She and her husband work to provide their children with everything they need.  Ana’s been selling clothes in the city for five years.  She learned this in her family since they are merchants.  She works mornings Monday through Saturday.

She’s asking for a loan to buy a variety of children’s, women’s and men’s clothes.  She will buy blouses, skirts, underwear, pants and little outfits.  This loan will help her have the economic resource to increase inventory and obtain higher profits.

Her objective is to find alternative way to strengthen the business which will in turn improve her economic capacity to face household obligations.

loans.use: to buy clothes.

loans.name: Nuevo Vencedor Group

texts.en:
Bernarda is one of the members of a group called Nuevo Vencedor (New Winner), comprised of five micro-businesspeople who sell clothes, natural products, shoes, food, and other items. They are located in the city of Samana, a developing tourist town that lies on the Atlantic coast and is rich in natural resources. Bernarda is a mother of three children and she lives together with them and her long-term partner.

Bernarda started her association with Esperanza because she needed to reinvest in her business. She sells underwear, both wholesale and retail, to her clients. Bernarda has operated her business for around five years now and began it with savings she had. She is very excited to be receiving her fifth Esperanza Internacional loan. She has successfully repaid her previous loans and has taken steps to expand her business.

Bernarda is requesting a loan to purchase a large amount of underwear to sell wholesale to her clients who resell this product; also, by buying a greater quantity she should be able to have a small inventory and to get discounts. She will use the profit from her loan to reinvest in her business. She thanks you all for your support!!!

loans.use: To buy a large amount of underwear to sell wholesale

loans.name: Daniel Antonio

texts.es:
Daniel, administra una tienda de productos domésticos, vive con su esposa y una hija, solamente su hija depende de sus ingresos, el inicio del negocio gracias al apoyo de su esposa juntos tuvieron la idea de instalarlo en la vivienda, no tiene horario establecido para atender a la clientela.

El solicita un credito para comprar a productos como aceite, arroz, sal, frijoles, queso, huevos, entre otra variedad que son necesarios para mantener el negocio, el crédito le ayudará a realizar una buena compra surtiendo el negocio y satisfaciendo la demanda de los clientes.

La aspiración de Daniel es tener un negocio más grande, más rentable, con mayor clientela, ya que eso le ayudará a poderle brindar a su familia una vida más solvente económicamente.
texts.en:
Daniel, owner of a domestic products store, lives with his wife and daughter. Only his daughter depends on his income. He opened the business thanks to the support of his wife; together, they had the idea of installing it in their house. They don't have an established schedule to attend to their customers.

He is asking for a loan to buy products like oil, rice, salt, beans, cheese, eggs, among other things that are necessary to maintain the business. The loan will help him to make a good purchase to support his business and satisfy the demand of his customers.

Daniel's aspiration is to have a business that is larger, more profitable, with a larger customer base, since this will help him be able to give his family a more economically stable life.

loans.use: to buy oil, rice, salt, beans, cheese, and eggs.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy sandals and purses.

loans.name: Hector Antonio

texts.es:
Héctor, vive con su madre, su esposa y tiene un hijo, es agricultor en pequeño sembrando maíz, tabaco y frijol, tiene nueve años de estar en esta actividad la aprendió de su padre, lo realiza para sustento de su familia.

Está solicitando préstamo por que inicia la siembra de la temporada y para ello deberá comprarse el abono, herbicidas, semilla de maíz y otros insumos agrícolas que son necesarios para aplicarlos al cultivo, el credito le ayudará teniendo todo lo necesario para realizar su trabajo con el fin de obtener una mejor producción que le genere mayores ganancias.

Su aspiración es crecer en el cultivo, año a año, ir ingresando nuevas maneras de cultivar y otros frutos, ya que esto le dará la oportunidad de generar más ingresos para su familia.
texts.en:
Héctor lives with his mother and his wife; he has a son.  He’s a small-scale farmer growing corn, tobacco and beans.  He’s been in this activity for nine years having learned it from his father.  He does it to support his family.

He’s asking for a loan because the planting season is starting and he must buy manure, herbicide, corn seeds and other farm supplies needed for the crops.  The loan will help him to have everything necessary to do his work in order to obtain better production that will generate higher profits.

His hope is to expand his crops year to year and to start new ways of growing other fruit since this will provide him with the opportunity to generate more income for his family.

loans.use: to buy farm supplies.

loans.name: Enso David

texts.es:
Enso, es un agricultor, vive en su casa propia junto con su esposa y una hija de un año de edad, realiza la siembra de granos básicos en cada temporada y también compra y vende ganado de pasto.

Él solicita un préstamo para poder invertir en los materiales que necesitará en la actual siembra de granos básicos, abono, herbicidas, insecticida, esto es lo necesario para poder realizar la siembra y prevenirla de las plagas, el crédito le permitirá tener una mejor cosecha más abundante.

El objetivo de Enso es crecer en sus cultivos hacerlos más productivos y mejorar también sus condiciones familiares.
texts.en:
Enso is a farmer.  He lives in his own house with his wife and one-year-old daughter.  He grows basic grains each season and he also buys and sells range cattle.

He’s asking for a loan to buy the materials he will need for the current planting of basic grains: manure, herbicide and insecticide.  This is what he needs in order to plant and prevent infestations.  The loan will allow him to have a better, more abundant harvest.

Enso’s objective is to expand his crops making them more productive and also to improve his family’s conditions.

loans.use: to buy farm supplies.

loans.name: Ramon De Jesus

texts.es:
Ramón, vive con su madre y tres sobrinos, se dedica a la venta de calzado para hombres y niños, este negocio surgió por sus amistades quienes lo indujeron a trabajar de esta manera, tiene ya tres años de experiencia.

Está solicitando un préstamo porque considera necesaria la inversión de mercadería al negocio, comprándose zapato casual zapato para hacer ejercicio de diferentes colores y medidas para hombres y niños, el credito le ayudará dándole los recursos financieros para que pueda realizar la compra y mejorar la disponibilidad en el negocio.

Su aspiración es ampliar el negocio, agregando más productos y una nueva ruta de venta, ya que esto le ayudará a seguir mejorando la vivienda donde reside con su familia.
texts.en:
Ramon lives with his mother and three nephews.  He has a business selling shoes for men and children.  He started this business through his friends, who led him to this type of work.  He already has 3 years of experience with the business.

He is requesting a loan, because he thinks that he needs to make an investment in merchandise for his business, buying casual shoes and also exercise shoes of different colors and sizes for men and children.  This loan will help him to have the financial resources he needs to make this purchase so that he can have more goods available to sell.

His aspiration is to expand the business, getting more products and a new sales route, because this will help him to continue to improve the house where he lives with his family.

loans.use: to buy casual shoes and exercise shoes

loans.name: Joseph

texts.en: Joseph is a 44-year-old married man. He has 5 children with ages ranging from 8 years to 20 years. He describes himself to be a diligent man. He operates a livestock farm where he sells livestock such as cows, sheep, goats, etc. He has been involved in this business for more than 5 years. His business is located within a market and his primary customers are local residents. He describes his biggest business challenge to be the high prices of livestock. He will use the KES 20,000 loan to buy more livestock for resale. His business goal is to run a slaughter house within 5 years. He hopes that in the future, he will have many livestock.

loans.use: buy livestock to resell.

loans.name: Elmer Elenilson

texts.es:
Elmer, se dedica a la venta de madera y de vehículos usados, vive con su esposa y dos hijos, sus hijos dependen económicamente de él,  aprendió de su hermano quien tiene un taller de carpintería, para poder instalar la venta de madera, lo tiene en la casa de habitación, su horario es flexible dependiendo de las necesidades de los clientes.

Actualmente está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de madera como cedro, aceituno, pino, entre otra variedad que puede existir y que pueda ser demandada por los clientes, este crédito le ayudará dándole los recursos económicos para tener la compra de mercadería necesaria y continuar trabajando.

La aspiración de él es tener un éxito en el negocio, ampliar el número de clientes y vivir en una mejor condición económica con su familia.
texts.en:
Elmer works selling wood and used vehicles. He lives with his wife and two children. His children depend on him economically. He learned from his brother, who has a carpentry shop. In order to be able to sell wood, he has it in the house he lives in. His schedule is flexible depending on the needs of his customers.

Currently he is asking for a loan for the purchase of wood such as cedar, olive, and pine, among other varieties that exist and that could be demanded by his clients. This loan will help him by giving him the economic resources to buy necessary merchandise and keep working.

His aspiration is to have a successful business, increase his client base and live in better economic condition with his family.

loans.use: to purchase wood such as cedar, olive, and pine.

loans.name: Roxana

texts.es:
La socia Roxana nació en la ciudad de Cusco y tiene 41 años de edad, ella tiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene dos hijos, ella trabaja como empleada en una empresa privada. En esta oportunidad la socia Roxana requiere el préstamo para uso personal o sea desea el dinero para el mantenimiento de la casa y va comprar mayólicas. 

La socia Roxana pertenece al banco comunal “Unión Latina” y le va muy bien pues es una persona responsable y puntual.
texts.en:
Member Roxana was born in the city of Cusco and is 41 years old. She has a common-law marriage by which she has three children. She works as an employee of a private company. At this time, Roxana requires a loan for personal use, in order to maintain her house and buy tiles.

Roxana belongs to the communal bank "Unión Latina” (Latin Union) and it has gone very well for her since she is a responsible and timely person.

loans.use: to maintain her house and to buy tiles

loans.name: Dany Rosibel

texts.es:
Dany, se dedica a la venta de tortillas y antojitos, vive en casa propia junto con su esposo y dos hijos menores de edad, el negocio de ella es la venta de los tortillas y los antojitos su horario de venta es de siete de la mañana a las cuatro de la tarde tiene aproximadamente seis años de estar en el negocio.

Ella considera necesaria la inversión de un préstamo en los materiales que necesita para realizar la venta, adquiriendo maíz, yuca, plátanos, frutas frescas, entre otros productos que le sean necesarios para continuar en el negocio, este credito le dará la oportunidad de mejorar, comprándose la materia prima para tenerlas al alcance y así aumentar su producción, su aspiración es a futuro crecer más con el negocio y crear una situación más solvente económicamente con su familia.
texts.en:
Dany sells tortillas and snacks. She lives in her own home with her husband and two minor children. Her business is selling tortillas and snacks from seven in the morning until four in the afternoon. She has been doing this business for approximately six years. 

She considers it necessary to make an investment of a loan in materials that she needs to sell. She will acquire corn, yucca, plantains, fresh fruit and other products she needs to continue with the business. This loan will give her the opportunity to improve, buying the raw materials to have them on hand and increase her production. She aspires to grow in the future with the business and create a more financially solvent situation with her family.

loans.use: to buy corn, yucca, plantains and fresh fruit.

loans.name: Daniel De Jesus

texts.es:
Daniel, vive con su esposa, sus hijos ya formaron los propios hogares, el realiza las labores de agricultor en pequeño sembrando maíz, frijol y yuca, también vende leña y comercializa ganado, él aprendió desde chico está actividades trabajando con su padre en la actualidad está mejorando sus siembras.

Solicita un préstamo para hacer la compra de los insumos necesarios como son el abono, los herbicidas, insecticidas y pago de mozos, con esto podrá tener lo necesario para realizar su trabajo en agricultura y poder obtener a futuro una cosecha sana y abundante.

Su objetivo es seguir trabajando en agricultura agregar mayores energías para poder recibir una mejor cosecha, también dedicarle tiempo a la ganadería y de esta manera generar mejores ingresos a su hogar.
texts.en:
Daniel lives with his wife. His children are already on their won. He works as a small farmer planting corn, beans and yucca. He also sells firewood and cattle. He learned these activities when he was young, working with his father. Right now he is improving his crops. 

He is asking for a loan to buy the materials he needs such as fertilizer, herbicides, insecticides and to pay for labor costs. With this he will be able to have what he needs to do his farmwork and in the future have a healthy and abundant harvest. 

His goal is to keep working in agriculture, putting in more energy to have a better harvest and also to spend time cattle ranching to make more income for his family.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, herbicides, insecticides and to pay for labor.

loans.name: Ana Thelma

texts.es:
Ana, vive con sus dos hijos quienes ya están acompañados, se dedica a administrar una tienda y también realizar labores agrícolas, ella aprendió la tienda por una cuñada y decidió instalar su propio negocio desde hace un año, sus clientes son los vecinos habitantes de la zona quienes ya la conocen.

Solicita un préstamo ya que considera necesaria la inversión en productos para surtir la tienda comprandose gaseosas, pollos, golosina, granos básicos, jabón y detergentes, también gas propano, crema y queso, esto le ayudará a fortalecer el negocio a través de la inversión con el préstamo.

Su objetivo es seguir creciendo y fortaleciendo el negocio, construir un local más seguros donde pueda instalar la  tienda, pues esto le dará una mejor condición para atender a sus clientes y para contar con su preferencia.
texts.en:
Ana lives with her two children who are already married. She manages a store and also is a farmer. She learned about having a store from a sister in law and decided to open her own business a year ago. Her customers are neighboring residents in the area who know her. 

She is asking for a loan because she needs to invest in products to stock her store, buying soft drinks, snacks, basic grains, soap and detergents as well as propane gas, cream and cheese. This will help her fortify her business through the investment with the loan. 

Her goal is keep growing and fortifying her business, building a safer locale to have her store in. This would give her better conditions to serve her customers and be preferred by them.

loans.use: to buy soft drinks, chicken, basic grains, soap and detergent.

loans.name: Dagbemabou Group

texts.fr: Le groupe DAGBEMABOU est composé de trois personnes qui résident dans le même quartier au Bénin. C'est la sixième fois que ce groupe sollicite l'aide financier de ALIDé, afin d'élever le niveau de son activité. La représentante du groupe, du nom de Ahlonsou est celle qui a le doigt levé sur la photo. Ahlonsou est âgée de 58 ans et est mariée à un certain Ingrid. Ahlonsou a peu fréquenté l’école. Le couple a six enfants, dont certains scolarisés et tous à leur charge. Ahlonsou et son mari assurent ensemble les différentes charges de la famille. Les enfants vivent ensemble avec leurs parents. Depuis près de douze ans, Ahlonsou vend de l’huile de palme dans un marché du Bénin. Parallèlement à cette activité, Ahlonsou va à la pêche à un lac du Bénin. Ahlonsou s'approvisionne dans une région du Bénin. Dans la quête de la satisfaction de sa clientèle et pour accroître son revenu, Ahlonsou sollicite, ensemble avec les autres membres du groupe DAGBEMABOU, un sixième crédit auprès de ALIDé. Les cinq premiers crédits ont été bien remboursés.
texts.en: The Dagbemabou group is made up of three people who live in the same district of Benin. It is the sixth time that this group has requested financial aid from Alidé, with a view to increasing their business volume. The representative of the group, whose name is Ahlonsou, is the one with her hand raised in the photo. She is 58 years old and married to a man called Ingrid. Ahlonsou attended school very little. The couple has six children, some of whom go to school; all the children are in their parents' care. Ahlonsou and her husband cover the various family expenses between them. The children live with their parents. Ahlonsou has been selling palm oil in a Benin market for almost 12 years. At the same time, she also goes fishing in a Benin lake. She gets her provisions in a region of Benin. With a view to satisfying customer demand and increasing her income, Ahlonsou is requesting, together with the other members of the Dagbemabou group, a sixth loan from Alidé. The first five loans were repaid in full.

loans.use: to buy containers of palm oil.

loans.name: Nonvignon Group

texts.fr: NONVIGNON est un groupe constitué de trois personnes et dont la représentante (dont le doigt est levé sur la photo) est nommée Florence Assiba. Les membres du groupe résident dans le même quartier. Âgée de 42 ans, Florence Assiba a peu fréquenté l’école. Florence Assiba est une veuve et mère de quatre enfants dont certains scolarisés et tous à sa charge. Florence Assiba assure les diverses charges de la maison. Pour parvenir à ses multiples charges, Florence Assiba vend des tissus, des plastiques, et des casseroles par le système de distribution. Parallèlement à cette activité, Florence Assiba vend de la nourriture à son domicile. Cette activité lui procure des revenus l'aidant à assurer ses différents besoins ainsi que ceux de ses enfants. Florence Assiba se ravitaille dans un marché du Bénin et au Ghana. C'est la troisième fois que Florence Assiba sollicite un financement auprès de ALIDé, ensemble avec les autres membres du groupe NONVIGNON, afin d'agrandir son activité et d'accroître son chiffre d'affaire et son revenu. Les deux premiers prêts ont été bien remboursés.
texts.en:
The group NONVIGNON consists of three people who live in the same neighborhood. The group’s representative is Florence Assiba, seen with her hand raised in the photo. She is a 42-year-old widow and mother of four dependent children, some of them in school. She herself received little schooling. 

Florence Assiba handles the various household responsibilities on her own. To that end, she sells fabrics, pots, and plastic wares through the distribution system. As a secondary activity, she also sells food from her home. She is able to earn the income necessary to provide for herself and her children. She buys her merchandise in a market of Benin and in Ghana.

To expand her business and to increase her sales and revenue, Florence Assiba is seeking a third loan from ALIDé together with the other members of the group NONVIGNON. Their two previous loans were repaid without incident.

loans.use: to buy fabrics, plastic wares, pots and kitchen utensils for resale.

loans.name: Fathi

texts.en:
Fathi is a 25-year-old father of one who lives in Sana`a, Yemen. To make a living, he sells automotive products such as car batteries. Fathi's father helped him start his business, and he has been able to expand his operation since he opened.

Fathi considers his business successful because of the profit that he earns, which permits him to maintain his family and to reinvest in his business. In the future he wants to become a prosperous businessman.  To this end, he has requested a youth loan of 200,000 YER from Kiva field partner Al-Amal Microfinance Bank to buy batteries for cars and trucks.

loans.use: to buy batteries for cars and trucks.

loans.name: Lorna

texts.en: Lorna, a 55-year-old married mother of four, lives in the Philippines where she has has been growing bananas and coconuts for the past six years, each month earning PHP 3,000. A member of GDMPC since 2006, Lorna has requested a loan of PHP 4,000 to purchase fertilizer such as manure. In the future, she hopes to improve/expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer such as manure.

loans.name: Juana

texts.es:
Juana, tiene 37 años de edad vive con su esposo y dos hijos de 16 y 14 años de edad, ella es ama de casa y también colabora con su esposo en los trabajos agrícolas, tiene más de 20 años sembrando maíz y frijol en el cual participa toda la familia.

Esta solicitando un préstamo por que iniciará sus labores en la siembra de granos básicos para esto necesita comprarse fertilizantes que le ayuden a fortalecer la siembra y poder a futuro obtener mejor cosecha, este crédito le dará la manera para poder invertir financiando el dinero necesario.

El objetivo de ella es a través de su trabajo y el esfuerzo de su esposo poder sacar adelante a sus hijos en educación y también ir mejorando su vivienda para ofrecerle a sus hijos una casa digna.
texts.en:
Juana, age 37, lives with her husband and two children, ages 16 and 14.  She is a housewife, and she also works together with her husband doing the agricultural work.  She has been growing corn and beans for over 20 years, and her whole family participates.

She is requesting a loan to start growing basic grains.  In order to do this she needs to buy fertilizers, which will help to strengthen her crops.  Then she will be able to get a better harvest in the future.  This loan will give her the way to be able to invest the necessary money.

Her objective is to, through her work and her husband’s effort, be able to get her children ahead in their education.  Her objective is also to improve her house in order to give their children a decent house.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers.

loans.name: Lane

texts.en: Lane is married and has 4 children. Lane is 32 years old and lives in Poblacion, Panaon, Philippines. Lane plants, harvests, and sells vegetables for a living, and she's been in this business for 3 years. Each month, she earns 3,000 PHP from doing this type of work. She requested a loan of 3,500 PHP to purchase additional seeds, seedlings, and young crops to raise. In 2011, Lane joined GDMPC. In the future, Lane wants to make improvements to her house and improve the general living conditions of her family.

loans.use: To purchase additional seeds, seedlings, and young crops to raise

loans.name: Auxiliadora Del Socorro

texts.es: Auxiliadora , originaria de Granada esta muy agradecida por haber sido beneficiada con un prestamo Kiva, el cual utilizo para comprar ropa logro mejorar y ofrecer variedad , mejoraron sus ingresos. Ahora esta solicitando un segundo credito para lograr obtener mas ingresos y lograr tener un tramo mas acondicionado donde puede colocar su mercaderia y dar una mejor atension, pues su meta es seguir progresando. Esta solicitando un segundo credito Kiva para para comprar mercadería como:ropa interior de mujer hombre y de niño.
texts.en:
Auxiliadora, who is from Granada, is very grateful for having benefited from a Kiva loan.  She used it to buy clothes, and she managed to improve, offer variety, and improve her income.

She is now requesting a second loan in order to get more income.  The loan is to upgrade her stand to where she is able to place her merchandise and provide better service.  Her goal is to continue making progress.

She is requesting a second Kiva loan to buy merchandise like underwear for women, men, and children.

loans.use: to buy underwear for women, men, and children.

loans.name: Violeta

texts.en:
This is Violeta, 47, resident of Manila, Philippines. Her husband is Danilo, an OFW (overseas filipino worker) and father to her child. She manages their own household while operating the business.

Violeta sells liquor and other beverages. She buys them in bulk and stocks them in her refrigerator. Her regular customers are her neighbors and the local community. She earns a minimum of 400 PHP in sales every day.

To help her continue operations of her business, she is requesting a 12000 PHP loan. She will be utilizing the loan to buy more liquor and other beverages. She expects a boost in her business income as she expands her business.
 
Violeta hopes her business will expand through all her hard work. She faithfully meets up with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her work every week and where she can also draw strength and inspiration from the word of God she studies.

* All CCT community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the word of God, build social capital and repay microfinance loans.

loans.use: to pay for additional supplies and products needed in her business.

loans.name: Melendrina

texts.en:
Melendrina, a hardworking entrepreneur who has been operating a restaurant in the Philippines for seven years, earns additional income from motorcycle transport. Melendrina has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of loans from NWTF, and is now requesting a new loan of PHP 10000 to purchase additional stocks of ingredients for the restaurant.

She dreams of saving money to expand her business in the future.

loans.use: to purchase additional stocks of ingredients for her business.

loans.name: Raquel De Jesus

texts.es:
Raquel, tiene 26 años de edad, vive con sus suegros, se dedica a atender el negocio en la venta de pupusas, éste lo inició con su esposo y tiene seis años de estar realizándolo, aprendió junto con su madre a preparar la venta. 
Esta solicitando un préstamo para invertirlo en la compra de los materiales necesarios para la producción de las pupusas, maíz, tomates, aceite, repollo, chicharrones, condimentos, otros ingredientes más que sean necesarios al momento de la actividad, este crédito le dará a Raquel los recursos necesarios para poder incrementar la producción en el negocio.

Su aspiración es desarrollar el negocio y atender con mayor capacidad a su clientela, esto le permitirá también solventar muchas necesidades económicas debido al buen funcionamiento del negocio y el porcentaje de ganancia que le quedarán.
texts.en: Raquel is 26 and lives with her in-laws. She has a business selling pupusas, which she started 6 years ago with her husband. She learned from her mother how to make the pupusas. She is seeking a loan so that she can buy the ingredients she needs in order to make the pupusas, such as corn, tomatoes, cabbage, pork rinds, oil, condiments and other items. This loan will enable Raquel to increase her production. Her goal is to develop her business and to expand her offerings to her customers. This will allow her to cover all of the expenses necessary to ensure that her business runs well and is profitable.

loans.use: to buy corn, tomatoes, cabbage, pork rinds, oil and condiments.

loans.name: San Cayetano Group

texts.es:
El comité se llama San Cayetano están en el séptimo Ciclo con 10  integrantes, es un grupo que se destaca  en el barrio por ser muy unido y responsable. Las miembros siempre se esfuerzan por poder ayudarse las unas a las otras y por medio de ese trabajo también poder ayudar a sus familias.
Nidi es miembro de este grupo, y cuenta que se dedica a la cría de animales de corral, como ser gallinas, cerdos, patos y demás. Dice que es un trabajo muy duro y a la vez de tiempo completo, pues siempre está pendiente de sus animales para que no les pase nada.
Ella solicita el crédito para la compra de balanceados para sus animales, ya que esto le será de mucha ayuda para poder seguir con su trabajo, el cual es sustento de su familia.
texts.en:
The committee is called “San Cayetano” and it’s in the 7th cycle with 10 members.  It’s a group that stands out in the neighborhood for being very united and responsible.  The members always strive to be able to help each other out and through this work also be able to help their families.

Nidi is a group member.  She relates that she works raising farm animals like chickens, pigs, ducks and others.  She says that it is very hard work and also full-time because she always is watching over her animals to insure that nothing happens to them.

She’s asking for the loan to buy feed for her animals which will be of great help to her to be able to continue with her work which is her family’s source of support.

loans.use: to buy animal feed.

loans.name: Ely

texts.en:
From Sibaroc, Jimenez, Misamis Occidental, Ely is 59 years old, widowed, and has six children. To make a living, she has been managing a gardening business for five years, usually earning about 4,000 PHP per month.

In 2008, Ely joined Kiva partner GDMPC and is now requesting a loan of 10,000 PHP to purchase more seeds, seedlings and young crops to raise. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve and expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional seeds, seedlings and young crops to raise.

loans.name: Patricia

texts.en:
Patricia is 57 years old, married, and has seven children. She works very hard to provide for them.  Patricia runs a general store in the Philippines, which she has been doing for 10 years.  She sells a variety of items such as canned goods, spices, sugar, cream, etc.

Patricia is requesting a loan for 29,500 PHP through NWTF, which she will use to buy stock to sell in her general store.  In the future, Patricia would like to save enough to build a house for her family.

loans.use: to purchase stock to sell in her general store

loans.name: Emilio

texts.es:
Emilio es viudo y tiene dos hijos los cuales están en etapa escolar, viven en casa propia ocupando dos habitaciones pequeñas y con paredes de adobe, la casa esta ubicada en la zona San Antonio de la ciudad de La Paz.
Actualmente se dedica a la elaboración de todo tipo de trabajos en madera ya que es carpintero trabajando por más de diez horas al día ya que es el único que cubre los gastos de alimentación, educación y pago de servicios médicos de su familia, es por eso que solícita el crédito ya que desea  comprar más madera y pegamento para la elaboración de trabajos y posteriormente venderlos ya que con lo poco que gana no le alcanza para comprar material.
El sueño de Emilio, es construir más habitaciones en su domicilio y ampliar su taller para mejorar sus ingresos y su calidad de vida.
Es la segunda vez que trabaja junto a IMPRO y KIVA.
texts.en:
Emilio is a widower.  He has two school age children.  They live in their own house occupying two small rooms with adobe walls.  The house is located in the city of La Paz’s San Antonio zone.

He currently works manufacturing all types of things out of wood since he’s a carpenter.  He works more than 10 hours daily since he’s the only one who covers food, education and medical expenses for his family which is why he’s asking for a loan because he wants to buy more wood and glue to make the items and then sell them since what little he earns is insufficient to buy the materials.

Emilio’s dream is to add more rooms to his house and to enlarge his workshop to improve income and quality of life.  This is the second time he’s worked with IMPRO and KIVA.

loans.use: to buy wood and glue.

loans.name: Sagrada Familia Group

texts.es:
El comité “Sagrada Familia” es de la ciudad de Santani, es un grupo muy unido, donde todas las miembros se ayudan para poder salir adelante e ir mejorando su estilo de vida.
Ramona es parte de este desafío y cuenta que tiene una pequeña despensa bien surtida, donde tiene los artículos de primera necesidad y con este trabajo puede ayudar a su familia. Su sueño es poder seguir creciendo y el día de mañana tener una gran despensa.
Ramona solicita el crédito para la compra de carne, pan, leche, verduras y demás, con lo que desea poder surtir su negocio y seguir ofreciendo variedad a sus clientes.
texts.en:
The group “Sagrada Familia” is from the city of Santani.  They are a very cohesive group in which all the members help each other to make economic progress and attain higher living standards.

Ramona is part of this effort and has a small but well-stocked grocery store.  Through this business she is able to help her family.  Her dream is to be able to continue growing and eventually have a large store.  She is seeking this loan so that she can buy meat, bread, milk, vegetables and more. This will allow her to supply her store and continue to offer a variety of products to her customers.

loans.use: to buy meat, bread, milk, vegetables and more.

loans.name: Jessica Alexandra

texts.es: Jessica de 25 años vive en Libertad junto a su familia. Se dedica a la compra y venta de ropa, empezó el negocio por iniciativa de una amiga quien le enseño donde se compraba la mercadería a precios más económicos y como vender. El proyecto lo inicio en un principio por que al ser madre soltera necesitaba una fuente de ingreso la cual le permitiera cubrir sus gastos. El negocio lo maneja sola solo en las mañanas de lunes a viernes y los fines de semana todo el día, lo realiza de este modo porque hay lugares peligrosos y al recorrer sola es propensa a asaltos. Entre los productos que más vende están los jeans de mujer que compra a $ 13.00 y vende a $ 18.00, camisetas a $ 10.00 y vende a $ 16.00, blusas a $10.00 y vende a $ 15.00 en la mayoría de sus prendas obtiene una ganancia de $ 5.00 aproximadamente ya que como la demanda es alta a veces se ve obligada a rebajar un poco el valor para poder vender. Con el crédito que solicita Jessica comprara productos para la venta esperando vender lo suficiente para poder ahorrar ya que su sueño a futuro es abrir un bazar en su casa, así pasaría más tiempo con sus hijos.
texts.en:
Jessica, 25, lives in Libertad with her family.  She buys and sell clothes.  She started the business encouraged by a girlfriend who showed her where to buy merchandise at more economical prices and how to sell.  She started the project initially because being a single mother she needed a source of income to cover her expenses.  She runs the business by herself during the mornings Monday through Friday and on weekends she works all day.  She works this way because there are dangerous places and going through them alone makes her vulnerable to robberies.

Among the products she sells the most are women’s jeans that she buys at $13.00 and sells for $18.00, t-shirts she buys at $10.00 and sells at $16.00, blouses she buys at $10.00 and sells at $15; she makes a profit of $5.00 approximately on each items she sells because since demand is high she sometimes must reduce prices a bit in order to sell.

She will use the loan she’s requesting to buy products to sell hoping to sell enough to be able to save up because her dream for the future is to open a home-based clothing store so she can spend more time with her children.

loans.use: to buy clothes.

loans.name: Trinidad

texts.en:
Trinidad is 57 years old and married with four children. She is from Mitugas, Tudela, Misamis Occidental. For the past 11 years, Trinidad has been selling baked snack food in her local community. She earns 2,500 PHP a month from her work and joined GDMPC in 2011. 

Trinidad is requesting a 3,000 PHP loan to purchase the raw ingredients she needs to make products to sell. She plans to use the income generated with her loan to expand her business and save for her future.

loans.use: to purchase raw ingredients to make products to sell

loans.name: Martha

texts.es:
Martha, es divorciada y tiene dos hijos que son independientes, vive en casa propia  ocupando dos habitaciones, la casa se encuentra ubicada en la zona Bolonia de la ciudad de La Paz.
Ella actualmente percibe ingresos ya que se dedica a la venta de ropa de mujeres  trabajando por más de ocho horas al día y de forma ambulante ya que no cuenta con un puesto fijo y con lo que gana debe cubrir sus gastos de alimentación, pago de servicios básicos y gastos médicos ya que no cuenta con seguro médico.
El crédito lo requiere para la compra de más ropa de mujer para poder venderla al contado o a crédito para mejorar sus ingresos.
El sueño de Martha, es aumentar sus ingresos y tener un puesto de venta propio para no  ambular por las calles ya que es muy sacrificado.
Es la primera vez que la cliente solicita crédito junto a IMPRO y KIVA.
texts.en:
Martha is divorced and has two children who are independent.  She lives in her own house, two-bedroom house located in the city of La Paz’s Bolonia zone.

She earns income selling women’s clothing.  She works more than 8 hours daily selling from place to place since she does not have a permanent stand.  What she earns she must use to cover her food, utilities and medical expenses since she does not have medical insurance.  She needs the loan to buy more women’s clothing to sell for cash and on credit to improve her income.

Martha’s dream is to increase her income and to have a sales stand of her own to no longer have to wander the streets which is very demanding.  This is the first time she’s asked for credit from IMPRO and KIVA.

loans.use: to buy women's clothes to resell.

loans.name: Edwin

texts.es:
Edwin, esta casado y tiene dos hijos pequeños, viven en la casa de sus padres, ocupando dos habitaciones, la casa esta ubicada en la zona Tembladerani de la ciudad de La Paz.
Actualmente percibe ingresos ya que trabaja como contador en un grupo minero por más de diez horas al día ya que debe cubrir los gastos de alimentación y pago de servicios básicos de su familia y su esposa le ayuda con lo que puede pues ella se dedica a la venta de zapatos a pedido y no gana mucho.
El crédito lo requiere para el pago de cursos de actualización en contabilidad, pues desea mejorar sus ingresos para mantener a su familia.
El sueño de Edwin, es tener su casa propia para dar más comodidad a su familia y de esta forma mejorar su calidad de vida.
Es la segunda vez que trabaja junto a IMPRO y KIVA.
texts.en:
Edwin’s married and has two small children.  They live in his parents’ house occupying two rooms.  The house is located in the city of La Paz’s Tembladerani zone.

He earns income working as an Accountant for a mining firm more than ten hours daily because he must cover food and utility expenses for his family; his wife helps with what she can since she works selling shoes via catalogue but doesn’t earn very much.

He needs the loan to pay for his Accounting refresher course because he wants to improve his income to support his family.  Edwin’s dream is to have a house of his own for more comfort for his family thus improving their quality of life.  This is the second time he’s worked with IMPRO and KIVA.

loans.use: to pay for an Accounting course.

loans.name: Vilma

texts.en:
Vilma is 42 years old and married with five kids. She lives in the Philippines. For the past five years, Vilma has been a farmer who cultivates fruits, such as bananas, to earn a living. She earns 2,000 PHP a month from her work and has been a member of GDMPC since 2010.

Vilma is requesting a 2,200 PHP loan to purchase fertilizer. In the future, she hopes to improve and expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer

loans.name: Ramona

texts.en:
Ramona is 57 years old and married with two children. For the past eight years, she has run a food production business in the Philippines. Ramona has borrowed seven previous loans from NWTF to sustain her business. 

Ramona is requesting a 15,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy additional ingredients for her business. In the future, she would like to expand her business and secure the financial stability of her family.

loans.use: to buy ingredients

loans.name: Rosalyn

texts.en:
Rosalyn is 41 years old and married with four children. Two of her children are in school and she works very hard to provide for them. For the past 23 years, Rosalyn has run a general store in the Philippines where she sells a variety of items such as spices, eggs, soap, sugar, soft drinks, and other products.

Rosalyn is requesting a 29,500 PHP loan through NWTF to buy more stock to sell in her general store. In the future, she would like to save enough money to afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy products to sell in her general store

loans.name: Pedro

texts.es:
El Sr. Pedro, tiene 51 años es viudo, no tiene hijos. Vive en su casa propia en la ciudad de Mariano Roque Alonso. Tiene una fábrica artesanal donde junto con sus hermanos confeccionan de pelotas para diferentes deportes y de diferentes tamaños. Gracias a su arduo trabajo ya ha podido hacerse de una buena clientela formada, ya que el siempre realiza muy buenos trabajos.
El Sr. Pedro solicita el crédito para la compras de insumos como ser cámaras, goma eva, pinturas, pegamento látex, etc. Lo cual le seguirá ayudando en su trabajo y de esa forma poder seguir progresando en su negocio.
texts.en:
Pedro is 51 years old.  He is a widower and does not have children.  He lives in his own home in the city of Mariano Roque Alonso.  He has a workshop where he works with his brothers to make balls in a variety of sizes for several different sports.  Thanks to his hard work he has been able to build up a good base of customers, since he always does good work.  

He is seeking this loan to buy supplies such as foam rubber, rubber air bladders, paint, latex pigment, and other items.  This will help him in his work and allow him to continue to make progress in his business.

loans.use: to buy foam rubber, rubber air bladders, paint, latex pigment, and other items for the manufacture of balls.

loans.name: Alma

texts.en:
Alma is 44 years old and married with three children. For the past three years, she has run a general store in the Philippines and she also earns an income from food vending. Alma has borrowed and repaid six previous loans from NWTF and works hard to provide for her family.

Alma is requesting a 10,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy additional items to sell in her general store. She aspires to repair and renovate her family home.

loans.use: to buy items to sell in her general store

loans.name: Florinda

texts.en:
Florinda is 62 years old and married with eight children. For the past 20 years, she has run a general store in the Philippines and she also earns an income selling milk and fish. Florina has borrowed and repaid five previous loans from NWTF. She works hard to provide for her family. 

Florinda is requesting a 20,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy more items to sell in her general store. In the future, she aspires to save money and expand her business.

loans.use: to buy items to sell in her general store

loans.name: Barsilisa

texts.en:
Barsilisa is 52 years old and married with seven children. She lives in San Andres, Pana-on, Philippines. For the past five years, Barsilisa has owned and operated a garden where she plants and harvests root crops and cassava to sell. Barsilisa earns 3,000 PHP each month and joined GDMPC in 2011.

Barsilisa is requesting a 4,000 PHP loan to purchase additional seeds, seedlings, and young crops to plant. In the future, she wants to improve the general living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to purchase seeds, seedlings, and young crops to plant

loans.name: Verbina

texts.en:
Verbina is 37 years old and married with two kids. She lives in the Philippines. For the past two years, Verbina has been cultivating fruits, such as banana and lansones, to earn a living. She earns 2,000 PHP each month and joined GDMPC in 2011.

Verbina is requesting a 2,500 PHP loan to purchase fertilizer.  In the future, she hopes to improve and expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer

loans.name: Letecia

texts.en:
Letecia is 84 years old and widowed with eight children.

She works hard to provide for her family. Letecia runs a general store in the Philippines and has requested a PHP 12,000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell in her general store.

Letecia has borrowed and repaid 27 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for 12 years and also earns an income from raising pigs and farming sugarcane.

Letecia aspires to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: To buy items to sell in her general store

loans.name: Marilou

texts.en:
Marilou is 38 years old and married with five children.

Marilou works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and has requested a PHP 22,000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell in her store.

Marilou has borrowed and repaid nine loans from NWTF before this. She has been running the general store for 22 years and also earns an income from charcoal selling.

Marilou aspires to save enough money to send her children to college.

loans.use: To buy items to sell in her general store.

loans.name: Rebecca

texts.en:
Rebecca works hard to support her family. She is married and has a bakery in the Philippines.

Rebecca has requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy ingredients for her bakery.

She has been in this business for 10 years now.

In the future, Rebecca would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: To buy ingredients for her bakery

loans.name: Marisol Del Carmen

texts.es: Marisol de 44 años de edad vive en la ciudad de Milagros es ahí donde mantiene su negocio de venta de cosmeticos. Ella es una mujer separada que tiene 2 hijos y desde muy joven ha estado vinculada a la actividad comercial. El negocio lo empezó hace 4 años y su manera de trabajar es recogiendo los pedidos para luego entregarlos, hace poco empezó con la ropa ya que sus clientes demandaban estas prendas. Marisol realiza la venta todos los días sola recorriendo diversos puntos en su ciudad ofertando ya sea por catalogo o llevando muestras, por lo general siempre lleva ropa para ofertar de esta manera sus cliente se las prueban y compran.  Por el momento no ha tenido ningún tipo de complicaciones en su negocio y espera continuar de esa manera. Con el préstamo que esta solicitando va a comprar perfumes, cremas, maquillaje, jeans y camisas. El sueño de Marisol es tener su casa propia ya que donde vive es alquilada y tener una perfumería.
texts.en: Marisol, who is 44 years old, lives in the city of Milagros. This is where she has her business, which is selling cosmetics. She is separated and has 2 sons. She has been involved in commercial activities since she was very young. Marisol started this business 4 years ago: her way of working involves collecting orders and then fulfilling them. Quite recently, she started selling clothes, since her customers asked for them. Marisol sells her products every day by herself, going to various parts of her city. She offers her products by showing them in a catalogue or bringing samples; in general, she always uses the latter method for clothes, as that way the customers can try them on and buy them. Until now, Marisol has not encountered any particular difficulties in her business, and she hopes to continue in this manner. With the loan she asks for, she will buy perfumes, creams, make-up products, jeans, and shirts. Marisol's dreams are to have her own house, since she lives in a rented one, and to have a perfume shop.

loans.use: to buy perfumes, creams, make-up products, and clothes.

loans.name: Nonvilele Group

texts.fr: NONVILELE est un groupe constitué de trois personnes et dont la présidente (celle qui a le doigt levé sur la photo) est nommée Marie Monhouédé. Les membres du groupe se connaissent compte tenu du fait qu’ils résident dans le même quartier au Bénin. Dans le but d'augmenter leur fonds de roulement, ce groupe sollicite un crédit auprès de ALIDé. Âgée de 58 ans, Marie Monhouédé est mariée à un certain Simon. Le couple a quatre enfants, tous scolarisés, et à leur charge. Marie Monhouédé vit ensemble avec ses enfants et son mari. Marie Monhouédé  assure ensemble avec son mari leurs différents charges. Marie Monhouédé a peu fréquenté l’école. Pour contribuer aux besoins du ménage, Marie Monhouédé mène comme activité, la vente de tissus à son domicile et de façon ambulante. C'est dans une région du Bénin que Marie Monhouédé s’approvisionne. Marie Monhouédé a déjà dix ans d’expérience dans l’exercice de cette activité. C’est la troisième fois que Marie Monhouédé et son groupe sollicitent un financement auprès de ALIDé. Ce prêt permettra certainement à Marie Monhouédé et aux autres membres du groupe NONVILELE à rehausser le niveau de leur activité par l’augmentation du stock de leurs produits et d’accroître leur clientèle et leur revenu. Les deux premiers crédits ont été bien remboursés.
texts.en: The Nonvilele group is composed of three individuals. Its leader (the one raising her finger in the photo) is Marie  Monhouédé. The group members know each other because they live in the same neighborhood of Benin. With the goal of expanding their working capital, the group members are seeking a loan from Alidé. Marie Monhouédé is married. Her husband’s name is Simon. They have four dependent children, all in school. Marie Monhouédé lives together with her husband and children. The spouses jointly provide for family needs. Marie Monhouédé sells fabric out of her home and as  street vendor. She stocks up in a region of Benin. She  has 10 years of experience in this line of business already. This is the third time that Marie Monhouédé and her group are seeking financing from Alidé. This loan will allow Marie Monhouédé and the other members of the Nonvilele group to expand their business by  enlarging their stock and increasing their customer base and their revenues. The two prior loans have been duly repaid.

loans.use: to buy fabric.

loans.name: Gloria

texts.en:
Gloria is 44 years old and married with seven children. Four of her children are in school, and she works very hard to provide for them. For the past 20 years, Gloria has run a general store in the Philippines where she sells a variety of items such as canned goods, sugar, soap, shampoo, and other products. 

Gloria is requesting a 15,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy additional stocks to sell in her general store. In the future, she would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy products to sell in her general store

loans.name: Letecia

texts.en:
Letecia is 63 years old and is widowed with five children. For the past 32 years, she has been running a general store in the Philippines and she also earns an income from selling bananas. Letecia has borrowed and repaid 20 previous loans from NWTF. She works very hard to provide for her family.

Letecia is requesting a 19,500 PHP loan to purchase more stock to sell in her general store. In the future, she aspires to save money and expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase products to sell in her general store

loans.name: Elvie

texts.en:
Elvie is 30 years old and married with three children. She is from Tudela, Misamis Occidental, Philippines.  

Elvie manages a retail store for a living. The work gives her a total of PHP 4,500 income a month. 

In 2010, she joined GDMPC. She has requested a loan of PHP 10,000 from the cooperative to purchase new items, such as candies, milo, shampoo, soaps, etc. 

She hopes to spare a portion of her earnings for maintenance costs and to expand her current offerings.

loans.use: to purchase new items such as candies, milo, shampoo, soaps, etc.

loans.name: Jasmine

texts.en:
Jasmine is married and a mother of four. She is 32 years old and lives in Tabo-o, Jimenez, Misamis Occidental. 

Jasmine owns and operates a motorcycle transport business. She established the business as a way of generating extra income of 5,600 per month. She has been engaged in this type of service for three years. 

Jasmine requested a loan of 11,000 from GDMPC. She intends to use the money to purchase motorcycle spare parts and accessories. Jasmine has been a good member of GDMPC since 2010. 

In the future, Jasmine wants to purchase more motorcycles to use in her business.

loans.use: to purchase motorcycle spare parts and accessories.

loans.name: Johna

texts.en:
Johna, 49, is married and has four children. She resides at Dinas, Sinacaban, Misamis Occidental, Philippines. Johna is operating a service-based business, providing transportation services to local community members to earn a living. She has been in this business for 7 years. 

Each month, she earns PHP 3,000 doing this type of business. She requested a loan of PHP 14,000 to purchase vehicle spare parts and accessories. Johna has been a member of GDMPC since 2010. In the future, Johna wants to purchase another transport vehicle to improve her business.

loans.use: to purchase vehicle spare parts and accessories.

loans.name: Marvelous

texts.en:
Marvelous is married and has a child. Marvelous is 25-years-old and lives in the Philippines. Marvelous is operating a service-based business, providing transportation services to local community member to earn a living. She's been doing this for 2 years and every month she earns PHP 4,000 from this work. 

She has requested a loan of PHP 10,000 to purchase vehicle spare parts and accessories. In 2011, Marvelous joined GDMPC. In the future, Marvelous hopes to improve the general living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to purchase vehicle spare parts and accessories.

loans.name: Nicanor

texts.es:
El socio Nicanor nació en la ciudad de Cusco y tiene 54 años de edad, él tiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene tres hijos. El socio Nicanor tiene una renovadora de calzados de forma ambulatoria. Ya son varios años que trabaja en este negocio y le va muy bien. En esta oportunidad el socio Nicanor requiere el préstamo para comprar materiales como por ejemplo cueros, clavos, hilos, cola y otras cosas más. 

El socio Nicanor pertenece al banco comunal “Unión Latina” y le va muy bien pues una persona responsable y puntual.
texts.en:
The member, Nicanor, was born in the city of Cusco and is 54 years old. He is in a common-law marriage from which he has three children. 

Nicanor has a mobile shoe repair business. He has been working in this business for several years, and it's going very well. At this time, Nicanor needs a loan to purchase materials like, for example, leather, nails, thread, glue, and other things.

Nicanor belongs to the communal bank "Unión Latina"; it's going very well, as he is a responsible and punctual person.

loans.use: to purchase materials like leather, nails, thread, glue, and more.

loans.name: Nara

texts.en:
Nara is married with 5 kids. She is 47-years-old and lives in the Palilan, Jimenez, Misamis Occidental, Philippines. Nara is a farmer and manages a gardening business to earn a living. She has been doing this for 2 years and every month she earns PHP 2,500 from this work. 

She has requested a loan of PHP 3,000 to purchase additional seeds, seedlings and young crops to raise. Nara has been a member of GDMPC in 2011. In the future, Nara hopes to improve/expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional seeds, seedlings and young crops to raise.

loans.name: Nain Caleb

texts.es:
Nain, administra un taller de estructuras metálicas, también realiza las labores agrícolas sembrando maíz, vive con su esposa y su hijo de 10 años de edad, desde hace ocho años ha iniciado el taller de estructuras metálicas y desde hace cuatro también realizan los trabajos agrícolas como la siembra del maiz, a través de ello ha podido mantener a su familia en condiciones adecuadas.

Solicita un préstamo para la compra de insumos para el cultivo de maíz y el pago del alquiler de la tierra comprándose también el abono y los herbicidas que son necesarios en el proceso de la siembra para prevenir las plagas y obtener una mejor cosecha.

Éste crédito le dará los recursos económicos necesarios para que Nain pueda mejorar la producción en sus cultivos.
texts.en:
Nain runs a metalworking shop and also farms, growing corn. He lives with his wife and 10-year-old son. He started his metalworking shop eight years ago, and has also been carrying on his farm work for four years, growing corn. By means of this, he has been able to properly support his family.

He is applying for a loan to buy supplies for growing corn, and to pay for renting land. He is also buying fertilzer and herbicides which are needed in the planting process, in order to prevent pests and obtain a better harvest.

This loan will give Nain the necessary financial resources, so that he can improve his crop production.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer, herbicides, and pay for renting land.

loans.name: Maria Ismaelda

texts.es:
María, se dedica a la compra y venta de ganado, tiene 35 años de edad, vive con sus tres hijos de 18, 10 y 7 años de edad, también con su esposo y juntos administra el comercio de ganado para poder sobrevivir con los gastos del hogar, desde hace cinco años están trabajando de esta manera y quien inició el negocio fue su esposo.
Ella está solicitando un préstamo para comprarse cinco terneros que aún están pequeños, ésta es una oportunidad que les ha salido para poder incrementar su ganado, lo cual este credito será muy importante ya que les dará los recursos económicos para poder realizar la inversión.

Su objetivo es estar mejorando con su familia y prosperando en el negocio, aumentando el número de ganado en sus terrenos ya que esto les dará mayor posibilidad de futuro ganar mejores utilidades.
texts.en:
María buys and sells cattle. She is 35, and lives with her husband and three children, ages 18, 10 and 7. They run the cattle business together in order to be able to get by and meet their household expenses. It was her husband who started the business, and they have been working in this way for five years.

She is applying for a loan to buy five calves that are still small. The opportunity has arisen for increasing their cattle herd, so this loan will be very important to them, as it will give them the financial resources to make the investment.

Her objective is for her and her family to do better, and for her business to prosper. She is increasing the number of cattle on her land, as this will give them greater potential to earn better profits in the future.

loans.use: To buy five calves.

loans.name: Yaneth Lucer

texts.es:
Yaneth es casada pero su esposo se encuentra laborando fuera de la ciudad, tienen una hija de 1 año la cual vive con ella. 
Para ella a sido difícil estar separada de su esposo por periodos prolongados, los dos entienden que es una necesidad que estén separados, de otra manera no podrían sostener los gastos familiares para poder sacar adelante a su hija.
Yaneth necesita reparar su vehículo que por el cual no esta saliendo a colocar su puesto en diferentes zonas de la ciudad, al reparar su carro le ayudara a tener mas movimiento de mercancía ya que por el momento lo tiene en su casa pero no es la misma venta que si estuviera en diferentes puntos estratégicos de la ciudad.
texts.en:
Yaneth is married, but her husband is working out of town. They have a 1-year-old daughter who lives with her.

It has been difficult for her to be separated from her husband for prolonged periods. They both undertand that is necessary for them to be separated. Otherwise, they wouldn't be able to meet the household expenses involved in raising their daughter.

Yaneth needs to repair her vehicle. For this reason she isn't going out set up her stand in various areas of the city. Repairing her vehicle will allow her to have more turnover of merchandise, as at the moment she has it in her house, and sales are not the same as if it were in various strategic points in the city.

loans.use: To repair her vehicle.

loans.name: Marcelina

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “LOS SOLIDARIOS”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Urubamba, perteneciente a la provincia de Urubamba y departamento de Cusco.

La socia se dedica al negocio de venta de flores,la socia vende rosas,claveles,plantas entre otras flores,la socia vende desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m,por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos,el sueño de la socia es ampliar el negocio de venta de flores.La socia solicita el credito para comprar semillas y abonos.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
She is a member of the communal bank "Los Solidarios"; the bank is located in the district of Urubamba, which is a part of the province of Urubamba and the department of Cusco. 

She makes a living selling flowers; she sells roses, chrysanthemums and plants, among other flowers. She sells from 8 a.m. until 6 p.m. As a result of this business she has been able to help her children get ahead. Her dream is to make the business bigger. She has requested a loan to buy seeds and fertilizer. 

She is happy to have this loan and she promises to make her payments on time.

loans.use: to buy seeds and fertilizer.

loans.name: Camilo

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “LOS SOLIDARIOS”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Urubamba, perteneciente a la provincia de Urubamba y departamento de Cusco.

El socio se dedica al negocio de crianza de animales como cuyes y gallinas y tambien se dedica al negocio de agricultura,el socio siembra papa y luego lo vende en los diferentes mercados,por medio de estos negocios el socio saca adelante a sus hijos,el sueño del socio es ampliar el negocio de crianza de animales y negocio de agricultura.El socio solicita el credito para comprar semillas  y tambien para comprar animales como cuyes y gallinas.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
He is a member of the communal bank "Los Solidarios"; The communal bank is located in the district of Urubamba, which is a part of the province of Urubamba in the department of Cusco. 

He makes a living raising animals, like guinea pigs and hens. He also works in agriculture, planting potatoes, and later selling them in different markets. As a result of these businesses he has been able to help his children get ahead. His dream is to make his businesses, of raising animals and agriculture, bigger. He has requested a loan to buy seeds and to buy animals, like guinea pigs and hens. 

He is happy to have the loan and promises to make his payments on time.

loans.use: to buy seeds and animals, like guinea pigs and hens.

loans.name: Rosal

texts.en: Rosal, a 62-year old resident of Punta, Pana-on and mother of three, helps provide for her family's needs from the PHP 3,000 she earns monthly from her five-year-old garden business raising cassava that supplements her husband's income. A member of GDMPC since 2007, she is requesting a loan of PHP 5,000 to purchase additional seeds, seedlings and young crops to raise. Rosal hopes to expand her business in the future.

loans.use: to purchase additional seeds, seedlings and young crops to raise.

loans.name: Juan Carlos

texts.es:
Juan es un joven de 19 años, vive con sus padres y hermanos en la ciudad de Chincha, a pesar de su corta edad él es muy trabajador, alegre y entusiasta, que tiene un gran deseo de superación y muchos deseos de apoyar a su familia; lamentablemente por la necesidad de trabajar y apoyar en los gastos de su hogar no ha podido estudiar una carrera profesional, pero sueña con poder hacerlo algún día, en sus ratos libre le gusta buscar pequeños trabajos para ganar algunos ingresos y en algunas ocasiones cocina un riquísimo Ceviche para compartir con su familia.
Con mucho empeño, entusiasmo y gracias al apoyo de sus padres, Juan trabaja como operario en una empresa agropecuaria de su ciudad, el labora un aproximado de 12 horas diarias y se siente a gusto realizando su labor, ya que lo consideran mucho por su buen desempeño y por su trato amable hacia los demás.
Juan se encuentra muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar el mejoramiento de su vivienda, él desea hacer el cercado del patio de la vivienda de sus padres con quienes vive, así también podrá realizar los acabados de su habitación, tales como tarraejado, puesta de piso y ventanas; de esta manera Juan tendrá su vivienda en mejores condiciones y podrá brindar mayor seguridad y bienestar  para su familia, a quienes quiere mucho y desea poder ayudar.
texts.en:
Juan is a 19-year-old young man. He lives with his parents and siblings in the city of Chincha. In spite of his youth, he is very hardworking, cheerful, and enthusiastic. He has a strong desire for self-improvement and really wants to support his family. Unfortunately, because he has had to work and help out with household expenses, he has not been able to study for a degree; however, he dreams of being able to do so one day. In his free moments, he likes to look for odd jobs to earn a little income and, on occasion, he cooks a delicious ceviche to share with his family.

With a great deal of effort and enthusiasm, and thanks to the support of his parents, Juan works as an operator in a agricultural business in his city. He works approximately twelve hours a day and he enjoys doing the work, given that they value his good performance and his pleasant demeanor.

Juan is very grateful to the Kiva lenders, because thanks to the help granted, he will be able to make improvements to his house. He wants to enclose the yard of his parents' residence, where he lives, as well as to carry out finish work on the house, such as plastering the walls and installing floors and windows.
